divs: Sighting DetailsA large white object entered the atmosphere very fast and exploded in the air over the Santa Cruz mountains, just west of Loma Prieta. There was no big sound, just a muffled pop. When it exploded concentric rings came from the center in a plane. They were all colors of the rainbow, and I could feel them pass through me because I was at the same elevation as the event. It felt like vibrations, or if wind could pass through you. Roughly 3000ft. I was looking out the window over a scene of the whole mountains south of the highway 17 over pass and Monterey Bay, and it was broad daylight. The news reported it as a meteor. I believe it was a ufo crash. There were no visible debris. And it came in realllly fast!
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Los Gatos
There were no other sightings in Los Gatos on or around June 13th 2003
